BR_text.BRsummary: Cannot set NODE_ENV in docker container
BR_text.BRdescription:
Although it is unlikely for production use, it would be nice to be able to override the value of NODE_ENV when running the server using the docker image.
 This is problematic since  is set explicitly for the run command: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepforge-dev/deepforge/blob/master/Dockerfile#L43>https://github.com/deepforge-dev/deepforge/blob/master/Dockerfile#L43</denchmark-link>
